application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to condition 21 (Materials details), of Variation of Condition reference 23/3188 dated 25/04/2024 for Variation of Conditions 2 (development built in accordance with approved plans and/or documents), 4 (commercial floor space - Use Class E) and 31 (storey heights of building) of Full Planning Permission (ref. 22/2225 dated 3 May 2023),  for the Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to provide purpose-built student bed spaces (Sui Generis) together with ancillary communal facilities, flexible non-residential floorspace (Use Class E), cycle parking, mechanical plant, landscaping, together with other associated works, subject to Deed of Agreement dated 3rd May 2023 under section 106 of Town and Country Planning Act, 1990, as amended (and subsequent Non-Material Amendment (ref. 23/2537).Subject to First Deed of Variation dated 25th April 2024 to the Deed of Agreement dated 3rd May 2023 under section 106 of Town and Country Planning Act, 1990, as amended
site_name: Fairgate House, 390-400 and 402-408 (Even), High Road, Wembley, HA9
